engine

Class Context

  • java.lang.Object
    • engine.Context

  • public class Context
extends java.lang.Object
    Allow to check if the action of a entity is possible, this Thread return the block found
    See Also:
    Runnable, JComponent

      Its a list of all Components in game's map
